content:
Here's my response:

In late February, I realized I was still mindlessly scrolling through Instagram despite the time limit, so I decided to take another break - this time for two weeks. During that break, I started a new hobby, painting, and I found it really helped me relax and express myself in a way that social media wasn't. The WhatsApp group was super supportive, and seeing their progress and struggles really motivated me to stay on track. After the break, I decided to delete the Facebook app from my phone altogether, and I've been feeling really liberated from the constant notifications and comparisons.
